item.title: Session 07
item.description: Recap What Happened? A Tough Decision During camp, Ravaria tells us that she’s struggling with her combat skills not being up to scratch. She’s not used to having free will, having been a soldier all her life and always being commanded by Glasya.

item.description: What Happened? Take Me (Axe)Home We’ve been tasked by the Queen with heading to Axehome, where Eero and other cultists had (potentially) booked it to.

item.title: Session 01
item.description: What Happened? Meet the Party M0-TH3R’s systems start up again and she finds herself in a basement, her ward now grown to an adult. She is being reset by her ward, but before it can be finished she breaks the teenager’s neck, cancelling her oath to protect them.
